appendix.title: How to work on this Book
appendix.para: These books are written with DocBook and can be converted to HTML or PDF documentation. Use the following command to checkout the official source of this book:
Check the README file for descriptions how to validate and generate them.

Use the standard GitHub work-flow to work on these books. This means fork your own copy of the repository, commit your changes there and create a pull request. This can be done at https://github.com/openSUSE/open-build-service-documentation

It is even possible to host instance specific content in the official subversion repository, it is just a matter to tag them correctly. Special parts of this documentation are tagged as <para os="opensuse;meego"> for example. In this case the paragraph will become only visible when creating the openSUSE or MeeGo book.
